name: Post It!
description:
Haaaa. I spent so much time on the community post it board, but no one even looks at it. . .

Hey, wait a minute.

Oh! Hey! Hi! You there, yes you!

Could you come check out my board? It's going to be super popular, I swear! It just. . . hasn't gotten a good start yet. Come post something! It'll be fun! . . .

Please?

Dev here! My sister and I had a lot of fun making this game (and pain as well, ha ha)! This is technically a finished build, but if you notice anything, please do comment it down below! Thank you in advance!

Art - LimeSync, Lawlalotti

"Coding" - Lawlalotti using Unity Fungus

Music - LimeSync

Character Design - LimeSync (Cameo character designs listed below)

Also, I'd like to shout out all of the people who posted cameo art in the discord! You guys rock!

  • Mercenary Rose from Mercenary Knight Rose; Posted by - Exevalon
  • Ghost from Team Movie Knights; Posted by - AuroreBorealis
  • Jammio Cameo! A Jameo if you will.
  • Saylor's Cat from Team Fish-Burner; Posted by - Earthshine
  • Slime from Dungeon Posse; Posted by - jackewing

-Dev Lawlalotti
